meaningMnemonic:
Someone on <kanji>sharp</kanji> <kanji>alert</kanji> has a <vocabulary>sharpness</vocabulary> about them. They are <vocabulary>quick witted</vocabulary> and have a strong <vocabulary>keenness</vocabulary> to them.

This word is formal and literary.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
